Diploma Program

What is Diploma Program?

Level Up College offers a Diploma in Social and Development Studies, designed to empower youth with the knowledge, skills, and practical experience needed to become agents of positive change in their communities. This comprehensive program spans four semesters (6 months each) and combines foundational and intensive courses to prepare students for careers in community development, social entrepreneurship, and beyond.

This program is ideal for high school graduates and university graduates seeking to bridge the gap between education and employment, while contributing to the sustainable development of their communities.

Subject We Offer

English

Description

English as a subject focus on developing the core skills of listening, speaking, reading, and writing to enable effective communication in diverse contexts. The subject also emphasizes grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation to ensure accuracy and fluency. Overall, it prepares individuals for academic, professional, and social success in an increasingly interconnected world.

Computer

Description

This comprehensive course provides students with practical, hands-on training in essential computer applications and multimedia production tools used in modern professional environments. Emphasis is placed on developing proficiency in word processing, data entry and analysis , layout design, graphic design, video editing, basic computer networking and Essential computer maintenance skills. This course is designed to provide students with essential IT skills to proficiently manage IT-related concerns in a workplace. Upon completion, learners will possess a versatile skill set applicable across a variety of industries and workplace settings.

Social Science

Description

The Social Science course provides students with a comprehensive understanding of key areas in social studies, including the introduction to social science, ASEAN (Association of Southeast Asian Nations), economic development, natural resource management, politics, and the sociology of religion. This course explores the interconnectedness of societies, economies, and political systems while emphasizing the role of cultural, environmental, and religious factors in shaping global and local issues. Students will engage in critical discussions and research to understand how these disciplines impact individuals and communities, fostering a well-rounded view of the world.

Community Development

Description

This course provides an overview of non-profit organization management and operations, covering human resource management, diversity, recruitment, compensation, training, and performance evaluation. It emphasizes fundraising, financial management, and introduces a Participatory Planning Cycle and tools for community development. Students learn collaborative problem-solving and active listening. The course also introduces Project Cycle Management, focusing on needs assessment, resource evaluation, project planning, and monitoring and evaluation using logical frameworks for successful project implementation.

Research

Description

Internship

Description

The 3-Month Community Internship Program is designed to equip Level Up Academy students with hands-on experience in community work, fostering the development of essential skills, capacities, and confidence needed for their professional journeys. Through meaningful service in partnership with community-based or civil society organizations, students gain practical insights into real-world challenges while making a positive impact in their local communities. This internship program is intended to serve as a vital bridge between academic learning and vocational careers, providing students with a strong foundation for their post-graduation endeavors.

Residential Support

At Level Up Academy, we offer two types of residential support to assist our students during their learning journey. Partial Support and Full Support . Partial support provides financial assistance to help cover a portion of the student’s living expenses throughout their academic period. Full support, on the other hand, covers both accommodation and meals, ensuring students can fully focus on their studies without financial concerns. All students selected to attend Level Up Academy are eligible to apply for support; however, support is granted for a fixed period of six months. To continue receiving assistance, students must reapply at the end of each support period.

Admission

At Level Up College, we are committed to helping you achieve your academic and personal goals. Our admissions process is designed to guide you step-by-step as you take the first step toward becoming a part of our vibrant community.

Level Up College

Level Up College is a community-based, non-profit higher education institution empowering youth from diverse backgrounds, especially those from marginalized communities and conflict-affected areas in Kayah (Karenni) State and the nearby region..
